Temperature gradient of pure water absorption (m^-1 C^-1)

Rudiger Rottgers, Roland Doerffer, David McKee, Wolfgang Schonfeld:
"Pure water spectral absorption, scattering, and real part of refractive index model"
Algorithm Theoretical Basis Document "The Water Optical Properties Processor (WOPP)"
Distribution: Marc Bouvet, ESA/ESRIN
Revision 7, May 2013

    da/dT
nm  1/(m C)
